author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/street-fighter-6/

Take on a special V-Rival, Professor Woshige!
A special guest V-Rival has arrived in the Battle Hub!

And it's none other than Professor Woshige, the man responsible for one of the most memorable fighting game moments in history!

Li-Fen has prepped the playable characters - Luke, Cammy, Akuma for you to challenge the professor himself, so head on to the Battle Hub and give it a whirl.

Satisfy the conditions and you'll get yourself a special emote and challenger screen illustration as a reward!

Event Availability: 2025/02/05 00:00 ～ 2025/03/09 23:59 PST

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #StreetFighter6 #SF6 #Capcom #Vrival #SimSim
title: Street Fighter 6 - Special V-Rival Event: Fight Professor Woshige! | PS5 & PS4 Games
